text: He may be small in stature, but this Jedi master, who was rendered in CGI in the Star Wars prequels, wields one heck of a lightsaber. This is the Star Wars mashup we ’ re looking for. In honor of Star Wars : The Last Jedi hitting theaters this week, Jimmy Fallon and the Tonight Show team made a hilarious mashup video of characters from all the movies singing “ MMMBop ” by Hanson. Yoda, Darth Vader, C - 3PO, and Jabba the Hutt all make appearances in the funny video. Watch it here : Fallon has chatted with multiple members of the Star Wars cast over past few weeks, including John Boyega, who talked about Prince Harry ’ s and Prince William ’ s cameos
